column4: Microsoft beats Wall Street view on high demand for cloud products

column4: Billionaire Paul Allen's yacht damaged Caribbean protected coral -media
column5: SEATTLE A massive luxury yacht owned by Microsoft Corp co-founder Paul Allen destroyed most of a protected coral reef during a visit to the Cayman Islands in the Caribbean earlier this month  media reported.
